thread.title: Carver elementary gets all-clear after temporary lockdown - Massachusetts news
thread.title_full: Carver elementary gets all-clear after temporary lockdown - Massachusetts news

author: boston.com
title: Carver elementary gets all-clear after temporary lockdown - Massachusetts news
text:
Students at an elementary school in the town of Carver were temporarily told to stay in place after an unidentified person entered school grounds, police said.
Carver Elementary School was given the all-clear shortly by 10:15 a.m after the school was searched by police and the canine unit, police said. Students who had been on buses outside then returned to class.
Carver is located near Plymouth, southeast of Boston.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below “Everything’s fine,” Carver Police said.
